name: Reunited (Pomz)
description:
You show up at someone's house, trying to reunite with them. 5 different endings, can you find the best one? 

Submitted to 'My First Game Jam: Winter 2023' with the prompt 'growth'. I tried to take a more figurative approach, and trying to figure out how the main character could 'grow' as a person. Was growing as a person even possible for you, or was every action you take futile from the start?

This was the first time I've made anything close to a finished game. And since I had experience with JS and HTML I decided to try an entirely text based game. It was incredibly fun to figure out how to connect certain points, as well as figure out how the story should go.

Even though it is submitted to a game jam, I don't expect anyone to vote for this game, as it is inherently an incredibly small game. All I ask is that you enjoy the experience!

If you find any mistakes, be sure to let me know so I can fix it as soon as possible.
